content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hubstaff is an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"optional\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tool that can be used \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to track your working time and identify time patterns, such as applications used, websites visited, time spent in collaboration with others, and other relevant details\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". As a result, you clearly understand the time-to-performance ratio, gaining the ability to plan your project work effectively and efficiently.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hubstaff securely collects data according to applicable data protection laws\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to use it?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you want to start using the Hubstaff, please \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caCreatAccount\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"submit a request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and wait for instructions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the start of the working day, you turn it on and turn it off when ready to call it a day. It’s important to note: if Hubstaff tracks more or less than 8 hours a day (within 25% limit)—there’s no reason to worry.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":36737,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03/hubnew1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03/hubnew1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hubnew1.PNG\",\"name\":\"hubnew1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":384,\"height\":208},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As
